comments.body: I'd suggest we make one step further, to just make the `sessionPartitions` a local variable only: this is because in later handling logic after the response is sent back, we only need `sessionPartitions.keySet / size` only, which we could maintain separately as a member field which is populated after the build() call. WDYT?
NVM I realized now you also need the `sessionPartitions` for saving one fetch state copying as well.
